title: Responsive Oracle Marketplace
subTitle: Oracle Marketplace Appstore: An online store to find and immediately start using the software and services that run in the Oracle Cloud.
detail:
Key modules on which I have worked, Development of responsive UI for Oracle Marketplace, targeting all major android, iOS and large screen devices. 
 Implementation of features like wish list for apps, automated get/uninstall/upgrade app flows, REST APIâ€™s etc for Oracle Marketplace.
 Integration of Endeca Commerce search with Oracle Marketplace for guided navigation and keyword search.

title: Socialize: Proximity based social networking app
subTitle: A proximity based social networking app to connect people
detail: Designed and developed the whole android App from scratch. Made all UI designs, logo and all work flow of the application

title: B-Tech Project: Surrealist conversion of Hindi sayings
subTitle: Surrealist motion video
detail: Worked on this project as a part of my graduation final project with Proff. Kaumodi Patil at Indian Institute of Technology ,Kanpur. Aim was to select an artform to convert some Hindi language saying. I picked up some sayings and converted it to may art forms like surrealism, realism, minimalism and cubism. As a final product i made two motion video by clicking 100s of pics. Music is not mine, i have taken online music available.
